job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: stronguPosition OverviewbrbrustrongWe are seeking a highly motivated data scientist who shares our passion for innovation to join our team within the Climate Science organization You will have the opportunity to be on the forefront of developing novel amp complex integrated agronomic models for recommendations on seeds agronomic traits and crop protection that farmers need today Our team has access to rich industryleading data sources to drive creation of predictive and prescriptive models that will shape the future of the agriculture industrybrbrAs part of our diverse highly dynamic group you will work sidebyside with a team of exceptional scientists with diverse backgrounds to deliver nextgeneration scientific breakthroughs while fostering your career growth and development If you are passionate about addressing feeding a growing planet sustainably with a direct impact on farmers the Climate Corporation would love to talk to you We work on hard problems because we love the challengebrbrstronguWhat You Will DobrbrustrongA Data Scientist plays a key role in delivering innovative scientific breakthroughs by applying predictive analytics risk optimization and statistics to integrated recommendations You will work closely with interdisciplinary scientists domain experts and stakeholders to predict the product performance and provide personalized prescriptions for growers while developing novel analytical models and best practices for complex data analysesbrulliExplore munge and model large and diverse datasetsliliDesign and prototype models using statistical modeling process modeling and other techniques such as machine learningliliImplement and test algorithms and techniques relevant to achieving project objectivesliliAnalyze and judge the quality of data and work with the data quality team to resolve issuesliliWork closely with a team of worldclass scientists engineers and mathematicians to deliver impactful scientific researchliliSelect the most appropriate modeling techniques and data visualization for large datasetsliliAssist with highlevel analysis design and code reviewsbrbrliulstronguBasic QualificationsbrustrongulliPhD OR MS 3 years of experience in Statistics Mathematics Computer Science or related fieldliliMinimum 12 years of experience in applying statisticalmachine learning solutions on a scalable platform to realworld applicationsliliFluency in a programming language commonly used for data manipulation and computational statistics such as Python required and SQL preferredliliFamiliarity with multiple regression techniques multivariate analysis mixed modelsliliStrong communication skills and the ability to work with diverse crossfunctional teamsbrbrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliTheoretical knowledge and practical experience with advanced statistical and machine learning analysis techniquesliliProficiency in programming computational and statistical algorithms for complex data setsliliProven experience with good coding practices such as version control code documentation automated testing and code reviewliliTrack record demonstrating excellent command of research questionsliliKnowledge and experience in farming plant breeding or physiology agronomy or geneticsliliProven experience using multiple forms of AI such as machine learning deep learning tensor flow neural networks or predictive analytics to drive decisions using new algorithms efficiently and rigorouslybrbrliulstronguWhat We OfferbrbrustrongOur teams are composed of industry experts top scientists and talented engineers The environment is extremely engaging and fastpaced with dozens of specialties coming together to provide the best possible products and experiences for our customersbrbrWe provide competitive salaries and some of the best perks in the industry includingbrulliSuperb medical dental vision life disability benefits and a 401k matching programliliEncouragement to get out of the office and into the field with agents and farmers to see firsthand how our products are being usedliliWe take part and offer various workshops conferences meetup groups techtalks and hackathons to encourage participation and growth in both community involvement and career developmentbrliulWe also hinge our cultural DNA on these five valuesbrulliInspire one anotherliliInnovate in all we doliliLeave a mark on the worldliliFind the possible in the impossibleliliBe direct and transparentbrbrliulstronguLearn More About Our Team And Our MissionbrbrustrongThe Climate Corporation  The Technology Behind Making A Differencebrhttpsyoutubec5TgbpE9UBI or visit httpsclimatecomcareersbrbrClimate aims to create a welcoming and
